info: Class Variants: Chunin and Dragon Shinobi (new art, same great skills!)
Akiban BladeMaster boss battle + reward gear
New upgrade bonus set: Akiban Street Gear
Seasonal Yokai New Year events return
LoreBowl LV gear + the /punt map returns
Kotobuki Yokai Hunt (Year of the Minotaur) + Event Rare gear
Obsidian Samurai Seasonal Set + Beleen's seasonal pink gear leave
